item.p: What angle between {{min_angle}} and {{max_angle}} is coterminal with {{angle}}?
What is the reference angle for {{angle}}?
Roughly sketch your results from parts 1 and 2 on a unit circle.
{{coterminal}} is coterminal with {{angle}}. You get this by adding/subtracting full rotations to the angle until the result falls between {{min_angle}} and {{max_angle}}.
The reference angle is {{reference}}. This is the angle in the first quadrant that is tilted away from the x-axis the same distance as your original angle.
In {{state_2}}, the angle is written as {{converted}}. This comes from multiplying by {{conversion_factor}}.
